title: Record High Temperatures - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/29/17
itunes:title: Record High Temperatures - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/29/17
description:
George Noory and renowned environmental consultant and former professor of climatology at the University of Winnipegreresearcher Dr. Tim Ball discuss the record high temperatures in specific places around the globe.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
